name: 2014 In Training Tech Shirt for Men
description:
Make a statement with the 2014 KeyBank Vermont City Marathon In Training shirt. This shirt ships for FREE!

Men's shirt in "Safety Orange"

C2 Sport Performance Tee with custom design. 100% Polyester moisture management/antimicrobial fabric, double-needle hem with tack, self-fabric collar.

name: 2014 In Training Tech Shirt for Women
description:
Make a statement with the 2014 KeyBank Vermont City Marathon In Training shirt. This shirt ships for FREE!

Women's fitted shirt in "Hot Coral" (Hot Coral is a new safety color that's a cross between red, pink, and orange - it's amazing!)

C2 Sport Performance Tee with custom design. 100% Polyester moisture management/antimicrobial fabric, double-needle hem with tack, self-fabric collar.

name: Tech Gloves
description:
"Run Harder, Run Longer" with these true performance gloves for outdoor athletes. It's a composite of polymeric fibers and acrylic which provides great thermal properties. The pointer finger and thumb are smartphone compatible too!

The gloves are black and the back of the left hand reads "Run Harder" while the back of the right hand reads "Run Longer" in lime green. The palm side of the gloves have black dot grippers. Proudly made in the USA.

Available in Black, sizes S/M and L/XL.

As always, if you're local to the Burlington, VT area and want to save shipping cost, pickup your order from our offices at 1 Main Street. Enter PICKUP at checkout.

name: Super Cool Socks - RUN STRONGER
description:
Super cool knee socks that make a statement without saying a word! Choose Run Faster, Run Harder, Run Longer, or Run Stronger (see separate listing for each wording). Our Socks are 68% Cotton, 25% Nylon, 4% Spandex and 3% Polypropylene. Proudly made in the USA.

Run Stronger socks are a dark grassy green.

Sizing: One size fits most. They have a cushioned foot and heel and are incredibly stretchy! Fits women’s U.S. shoe size 7 to 11 and men’s U.S. shoe size 7 to 12.5. The socks are 14 inches from heel to the top of the cuff (unstretched). Machine wash cold. Hang somewhere to dry.

As always, if you're local to the Burlington, VT area and want to save shipping cost, pickup your order from our offices at 1 Main Street. Enter PICKUP at checkout.

name: NEW 26.2 Retro Design Tech Shirt
description:
Based on our very popular 25th anniversary retro design, this tech t has been updated with 26.2 design printed center chest. Stay dry and comfortable in this Alo Sport Shirt with this moisture-management tee. 4.1 oz., 100% polyester interlock. Dry-wicking and anti-microbial capabilities.

Available in both men's and women's fitted styles. Men's fit is charcoal grey. Women's fit is black.

name: Women's Performance Fleece
description: You'll love this black performance fleece for women with the official KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay logo embroidered left chest. Reflective piping at back raglan seams, chin guard and center front reverse coil zipper with reflective asymmetric piping.

name: Men's Performance Fleece
description: You'll love this carbon heather performance fleece for men with the official KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay logo embroidered left chest. Reflective piping at back raglan seams, chin guard and center front reverse coil zipper with reflective asymmetric piping.

name: 26.2 Sticker
description: Green oval 26.2 Vermont sticker. Approximately 6" wide x 4.5" tall.

name: RunVermont Running Hat
description: White runners hat with RunVermont logo. Lightweight nylon with mesh insert on each side. Adjustable back strap with clip. Great hat for running - keeps you cool on hat summer days.

name: RunVermont Trucker Hat
description: Worn-in cotton and mesh trucker hat with the RunVermont logo embroidered across the front. Available in Navy or Forest Green.

name: Textured Soft Shell Men's Hooded Jacket
description: Very popular jacket with the KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay logo embroidered left chest. Water and wind resistant, breathable, and insulated. Zippered chest and sleeve pockets with contrast bar tack; Front zippered pockets with contrast bar tack; Open hem.

name: Textured Soft Shell Women's Hooded Jacket
description: Very popular jacket with the KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay logo embroidered left chest. Water and wind resistant, breathable, and insulated. Zippered chest and sleeve pockets with contrast bar tack; Front zippered pockets with contrast bar tack; Open hem.

name: Distressed Zip Hoodie
description: Full zip hoodie with KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay graphic printed center chest. Available in dark grey and maroon (not pictured).

name: Tech T Men
description:
25th KeyBank Vermont City Marathon vintage art printed center chest. 
Stay dry and comfortable in this Alo Sport Shirt with this moisture-management tee. 4.1 oz., 100% polyester interlock. Dry-wicking and anti-microbial capabilities. Set-in sleeves

name: Tech T Women
description:
25th KeyBank Vermont City Marathon vintage art printed center chest. 
Stay dry and comfortable in this Alo Sport Shirt with this moisture-management tee. 4.1 oz., 100% polyester interlock. Dry-wicking and anti-microbial capabilities. Set-in sleeves

name: FirstRun 2013 Long Sleeve Tech Shirt
description: Zorrel long sleeve tech shirt in red with silver and teal print. Offered in both women’s and unisex/men’s fit. 100% microfiber polyester with covered stitch seams and moisture transport technology.

name: CLEARANCE! Men's 2013 In Training Shirt
description: Ideal for winter training, this 6.3oz. 100% peached polyester pique zip pullover shirt features the UltraCool™ system to control and manage perspiration. It is constructed with raglan sleeves, square bottom and open cuffs. The shirt is navy blue with silver and green printing on the left chest.

name: CLEARANCE! Women's 2013 In Training Shirt
description: Ideal for winter training, this women's fit 6.3oz. 100% peached polyester pique zip pullover shirt features the UltraCool™ system to control and manage perspiration. It is constructed with raglan sleeves, square bottom and open cuffs. The shirt is coral colored with navy and silver printing.

name: Run Vermont 1989 Women's T
description: Fitted women's t with vintage Run Vermont 1989 design.

name: 2013 25th Anniversary Lapel Pin
description: Silver Anniversary Lapel Pin featuring the 25th Anniversary KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay logo. The pin is 1.25" die struck silver nickel plated hard enamel lapel with printed colors and black rubber clutch back attachment.

name: Running Hat - Anniversary logo
description: Red runner's hat with the KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay logo embroidered front and the 25th Anniversary banner embroidered on the back. Adjustable - one size fits most.

name: 2013 Marathon Logo T
description: Women's short sleeve fitted cotton t-shirt with the 2013 25th Anniversary Marathon logo printed center chest. These shirts are very fitted. We suggest ordering up one size from your normal size.

name: 2013 Marathon Logo T Men
description: Men's short sleeve cotton t-shirt with the 2013 25th Anniversary Marathon logo printed center chest.

name: RunVermont Burlington Hoodie
description: Dark Charcoal heathered hooded sweatshirt with RunVermont Burlington printed center chest. Also available in Athletic Grey (lighter grey).

name: Youth Zip Hoodie
description: Youth size full zip hoodie printed with "Peace, Love, Run" and "KeyBank Vermont City Marathon Burlington, VT" graphics left chest. Choose from pink or blue.

name: RunVermont Visor
description: Navy cotton visor with contrast piping around the brim, with embroidered RunVermont logo. Velcro closure in the back for custom fit.

name: Street Names Raglan Shirt
description: This casual poly/cotton/rayon 3/4 sleeve shirts features the words "KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay" across the chest. The back showcases a variety of the streets in Burlington that the race covers.

name: 25th Anniversary Hoodie
description: Heavyweight navy hooded sweatshirt with the 2012 25th Anniversary KeyBank Vermont City Marathon logo printed center chest.

name: Running Hat - Red
description:
Red runner's hat with KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay "wing" logo embroidered front. Adjustable - one size fits most.

Two embroidery colors available - 
Red hat with blue/black/white logo
Red hat with white/yellow/red logo

name: Running Hat - White
description:
White runner's hat with KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay "wing" logo embroidered front. Adjustable - one size fits most.

Two embroidery colors available - 
White hat with blue/yellow/gray logo
White hat with purple/yellow/black logo

name: Run Local, RunVermont Women's Cotton Tee
description: Fun, fitted cotton t-shirt with "Run Local, RunVermont" design printed center chest. These shirts are very fitted. We suggest ordering up one size from your normal size.

name: Run Local, RunVermont Men's Cotton Tee
description: Short sleeve cotton t-shirt with "Run Local, RunVermont" design printed center chest.

name: Run Local, RunVermont Youth T
description: Navy blue, 100% cotton youth t-shirt.

name: Screen Printed 25th Anniversary Poster
description: We are thrilled to have this amazingly artful hand screen printed poster to celebrate and commemorate our 25th anniversary! The print is a 20" x 10" five color screen print. Very few posters remain.

name: Half Unplugged Runner Hats
description: Available in three color - white, red, royal blue. Adjustable strap in back. Mesh panels on each side.

name: Women's Track Jacket
description:
Authentic with a twist, this is a great track jacket, and then some. Includes a retro marathon logo on the right hip pocket. Thermal stretch fabric is made with 58% landfill-busting recycled PET. Features an unstructured shaped hood, soft and fuzzy interior, subtly textured matte face, draft-stopping and chafe-preventing windflap, and binding along the sleeve cuffs and bottom hem for a great fit. For sure, this track star runs laps around other hoodies. 

Made from: 58% recycled polyester, 37% polyester; 5" spandex.

Clearance items are final sale.

name: Women's Tech Tank
description:
100% polyester birdseye knit jacquard tee with a bright blue KeyBank Vermont City Marathon logo on the left chest. Dry wicking and antimicrobial performance capabilities. Sleeveless tee with contoured shoulder panels and side panels. Contrast coverstitching at shoulders and side-seams.

Also available in men's fit.

Clearance items are final sale.

name: Men's Tech Tank
description:
100% polyester birdseye knit jacquard tee with a bright blue KeyBank Vermont City Marathon logo on the left chest. Dry wicking and antimicrobial performance capabilities. Sleeveless tee with contoured shoulder panels and side panels. Contrast coverstitching at shoulders and side-seams.

Also available in women's fit.

Clearance items are final sale.

name: Women's Tech T
description:
Make every workout count with a shirt that moves with you and keeps you comfortably dry and cool. Dry wicking and anti-microbial. Women's cut with graphic printed on the upper back of shirt.

Available in Light Pink and Navy Blue.

name: Men's Tech T
description: Make every workout count with a shirt that moves with you and keeps you comfortably dry and cool. Dry wicking and anti-microbial. Men's cut with graphic printed on the upper back of shirt.

name: Women's Running Shorts
description:
Navy running shorts with a KeyBank Vermont City Marathon logo on the left leg. Mesh inserts down each side. Fully lined.

Clearance items are final sale.

name: Men's Running Shorts
description:
Navy running shorts with a KeyBank Vermont City Marathon logo on the left leg. Mesh inserts down each side. Fully lined.

Clearance items are final sale.

name: KBVCM Distressed Tee
description: Unisex cotton t-shirt with white logo printed front.

name: Running Hat - Red with silver logo
description: Red runner's hat with KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay "wing" logo embroidered front. Lightweight nylon with mesh insert on each side. Adjustable - one size fits most.

options.name: Red hat with silver and magenta logo

name: RunVermont Burlington Hoodie Gray
description: Cozy hoodie sweatshirt with vintage RunVermont P.E. logo. Unisex sizing.

name: 2012 Commemorative Poster
description: Vermont artist Dug Nap created this amusing poster for the 2012 KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay. Poster measures 16" x 21".

name: 2011 Commemorative Poster
description: Poster measures 18" x 24".

name: 2010 Commemorative Poster
description: Poster measures 18" x 24".

name: 26.2 Sticker - Pink
description: Pink and lime green oval 26.2 KeyBank Vermont City Marathon sticker. Approximately 6" wide x 4.5" tall.

name: 26.2 Mini Sticker
description: Mini oval 26.2 Vermont sticker. Approximately 3" wide x 2" tall.

name: 13.1 Sticker
description: Orange oval 13.1 KeyBank Vermont City Marathon & Relay sticker. Approximately 6" wide x 4.5" tall.
